references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which is the core methodology of the target paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper extends the diffusion model to generate high-resolution images, which directly addresses the image generation capability required in object tracking.

references.paper_title: Deep unsupervised learning using nonequilibrium thermodynamics
references.reason: This paper introduces a theoretical framework for deep unsupervised learning, which provides the foundation for the theoretical analysis in the target paper.

references.paper_title: Diffusiontrack: Diffusion model for multi-object tracking
references.reason: This paper proposes a diffusion model for multi-object tracking, providing a direct comparison and competitive analysis for the target paper's approach.

references.paper_title: Diffmot: A real-time diffusion-based multiple object tracker with non-linear prediction
references.reason: This paper is another concurrent work on applying diffusion models to object tracking, providing a comparative analysis in performance.
